Former Purdue defensive tackle Jake Replogle will not be pursuing an NFL career despite being a likely draft pick PERIOD

While many athletes struggle for a balance between remaining agile and building muscle mass one of Purdues defensive linemen has perfected just that PERIOD

Defensive tackle Jake Replogle bulked up to a solid  pounds but that doesnt stop him from being what head coach Darrell Hazell referred to as one of the best players in the Big Ten PERIOD

Replogle started all  games during the  season making a seasonhigh five solo tackles in three games and finishing the season with  tackles PERIOD Hazell believes he will be an even bigger threat in the coming season PERIOD

 said Hazell PERIOD 

Hazell is not the only coach taking notice of Replogle PERIOD Offensive coordinator John Shoop called the defensive tackle a thorn in his side PERIOD

According to Shoop Replogle along with the rest of the defensive line are preparing the Boilermaker offense for what it may see in the Big Ten PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Jake Replogle bulked up and is better than ever and is ready for the  football season PERIOD

Standout defensive lineman Jake Replogle took the offseason to bulk up and prepare for the  football season PERIOD Coach Hazell voices his confidence in Replogle and the team PERIOD The Boilermakers can only wait in preparation for the season PERIOD
